original: 潁川鄢陵人，西晉官員，庾峻之子。和其父大異，好玄學清談，作風浮華，碌碌無為。永嘉之亂時，被後趙石勒俘虜，不久後被殺。
text: Yanling from Yingchuan, an official of the Western Jin Dynasty, son of Yu Jun. Very different from his father, good metaphysical talk, flashy style, mediocre. During the Yongjia Rebellion, he was captured by Hou Zhao Shile and was killed soon after.
